title: Top Places to Visit in Ballia, Uttar Pradesh
content: Ballia is a city with a municipal board in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh bordering Bihar. The eastern boundary of the city lies at the junction of two major rivers, the Ganges and the Ghaghara. The city is situated 140 km (87 mi) east of Varanasi. Bhojpuri is the primary local language.
